snippet.title: Ultra Ninja Soul -- First Look PC/Steam (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
An old-school style platformer that's decent but seems to be relatively short. I see on the store page that there are 4 bosses, I died to the 4th boss in this first try. I didn't feel like going back to trying to beat him, after throwing everything I had at him in my first attempt and somehow not taking him down.

Steam store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1621950/ULTRA_NINJA_SOUL/
